channel.title: All of the models and animations were great...except the mp5
channel.description:
What happened? Who approved that? I think it really takes away from the game, seeing as it's practically the main weapon.
The model appears of lower quality than the rest of the weapons(low poly and the front sight isn't finished....)
The animation is lackluster(the dinky little charging handle moves on it's own...)
Other than that and a few quad core issues, bravo team! :slight_smile:

item.title: All of the models and animations were great...except the mp5
item.dc:creator: HEVcrab
item.description:
Yes, I’d love if the BM Team fixes this.

Read full topic
